title: The Latest: Kardashians show support for Lamar Odom online
text: SUBSCRIBE FOLLOW US Â© 2015 Cox Media Group . By using this website, you accept the terms of our Visitor Agreement and Privacy Policy , and understand your options regarding Ad Choices . Learn about careers at Cox Media Group . The Latest: Kardashians show support for Lamar Odom online FILE - In this June 30, 1999, file photo, Lamar Odom smiles after being selected fourth by the Los Angeles Clippers in the first round of the NBA Draft at the MCI Center in Washington. Odom spent most of his 14-year NBA career in Los Angeles with the Lakers and Clippers, becoming a fan favorite before he sought even more fame with the Kardashians. Odom, who was embraced by teammates and television fans alike for his Everyman approach to fame, was found face-down and alone Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, after spending four days at the Love Ranch, a legal Nevada brothel. (AP Photo/Khue Bui, File) Most Read
